titleInfo.title: Grand Ole Opry Celebrates 20 Years Emmylou Harris as a member

mods.abstract: Two color window card (blue and green on light yellow) announcing Emmylou Harris celebrating 20 years as a Grand Ole Opry Member on January 21. Poster features woodcut border flourishes.

recordInfo.recordContentSource: Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum
